title: The best match making.

embed.description: League of Legends live game search. Find out how well your opponents farm, which roles they main, and how hard they carry.

body:
So I queue up to play a normal game, Im silver 3 my team is also silver.  Match making decides to put us against
Plat 3 Riven
Gold 5 Garen (I'm ok with the garen its around the same level)
Plat 2 Nautulis
Plat 5 Tristana
Diamond 5 Nidalee

Why does Riot match making do this? 

We got smashed as one would expect.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kaze Enigma,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=X1yJ5qVZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-20T22:32:34.697+0000)
>
> So I queue up to play a normal game

stopped reading here tbh.
Love it. It's been explained a million times therefore you're lucky I'm gonna say it. Ranked mmr is different to normal mmr. If they always play ranked- their mmr on norms is gonna be noob af
